snippet.title: April Fools' Day jokes can be far-fetched | Don't get any ideas from these gags, unless you're willing to be on the receiving end
snippet.description: In the run-up to April Fools' Day, we asked a few area pranksters to share their favorite April Fools' gags. Good April Fools' Day pranks tread a fine line between clever and cruel. Do it right, and people will be impressed by your creativity. Do it wrong, and you could
